channel.title: Autonomous Vehicles on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 60 Italian Mayors Want to Be the Unlikely Solution to Self-Driving Cars in Europe
item.description: A network of local officials in Italy want to turn their cities into laboratories for the vehicles of tomorrow in the hope of catching up with the US and China.

item.title: Did Tesla’s Robotaxi Launch Backfire?
item.description: Survey data shared exclusively with WIRED suggests that Tesla’s newest autonomous driving technology has freaked out some consumers.
